name: Orbital Chaos [Beta]
description:
ORBITAL CHAOS

Orbital Chaos is a stress releving game made by Boxply_Dev. It was a homecrafted, homemade, simple game, done in 12 hours as a challenge! It was incredibly fun making this game, and hope it is just as fun playing the game! If you find any issues or problems, feel free to comment and I'll update the game to fix those bugs! 

Possible Future Updates:

- Currency

- Purchasable Planets to make your gravitational pull go further (rn you can go as far as you want but later it'll be limited)

- Upgrades (like gravitational pull, and force, if you can pull big objects)

- more enemies

- random map generation with asteroids and etc

- Maybe keyboard and mouse support

- IOS Support
